section_text: 1 This Act may be cited as the Pedlars Act 1881. This Act and the  Pedlars Act 1871, may be cited together as the Pedlars Acts 1871 and 1881.

section_title: Alteration of 34 & 35  Vict.  c. 96 so far as regards requiring indorsement of a pedlar’s certificate.
section_text: 2 A pedlar’s certificate granted under the Pedlars Act 1871, shall during the time for which it continues in force authorise the person to whom it is granted to act as a pedlar within any part of the United Kingdom.  . . .
